SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into articleinfo (title, urls, praiseNum, readNum, commentNum, avgscore, creatStamp, isTop) values (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{praisenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{readnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commentnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{avgscore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creatstamp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{istop,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update articleinfo set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, urls = #{urls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, praiseNum = #{praisenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, readNum = #{readnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, commentNum = #{commentnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, avgscore = #{avgscore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creatStamp = #{creatstamp,jdbcType=BIGINT}, isTop = #{istop,jdbcType=INTEGER} where articleId = #{articleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select articleId, title, urls, praiseNum, readNum, commentNum, avgscore, creatStamp, isTop from articleinfo where articleId = #{articleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select articleId, title, urls, praiseNum, readNum, commentNum, avgscore, creatStamp, isTop from articleinfo
